If you hold the left mouse button and move the mouse around, you can do flips and rolls if your pack RCS is on. However, once you press any movement key, you automatically get realigned head-up.

Yes, thanks, I've played with the RCS that way, but I see videos where players are making their little guys whirl while jumping on the moons. I can do that by spinning the camera just as I hit the jump key, but that doesn't seem to be what these people are doing because the camera doesn't move. My guys are happy jumping on the moon, so I want them to be able to twirl.

By the way, how do you get the little guy to spin in the (lack of) air like that?

I crashed a guy on the moon and discovered the jump button (spacebar). So i was hopping around on the moon and I hit it and he did a flip to face my direction. I never got to reproduce it, but maybe it was an easter egg in the jump code...

You can do double jumps like a mario game or something too.

Just tap the spacebar twice very quickly.

Works for me every time, not sure if it's a bug in my game or what...but either way, it's fun.
